quotes.quote: Of the small gifts of heaven, /It seems to me a more than equal share / At birth was given / To girls with curly hair.
Anybody who has curly hair knows you don't want it to be brushed out because it becomes a never-ending tangle.
Curly girl: It's more than just hair, it's an attitude.
Naturally curly hair is a curse, and don't ever let anyone tell you different.
Ladies with curly hair / Have time to spare.
I haven't come to you only to take, I haven't come to you empty handed. I bring you poetry as great as yours but in another tongue, I bring you black eyes and golden skin and curly hair.
Have you ever buried your nose in a mountain of curls, and just wanted to go to sleep forever?
She had her back to them and was talking to Luke and Jocelyn, laughing, flinging her curly hair back. "Don't even think about it."

I was a big Guns N' Roses fan when I was seven. My friend who lived across the street had long dark curly hair and I had long blonde hair, so I'd dress up as Axl and she'd be Slash, and we'd rock out in front of the mirror singing 'Patience.'
People always expect more of you when you have naturally curly hair!
Curls are like a box of chocolates you never know which type you're going to get.
I was shy, but it came out in a big personality. My turning point was when I let my hair go naturally and I got contact lenses.
